snippet: Francis personally signed a Vatican statement of friendship at the end of the Muslim holy month of Ramadan.
abstract: Pope Francis personally signs Vatican statement of friendship at the end of the Muslim holy month of Ramadan, calling for 'mutual respect' between Christianity and Islam.
lead_paragraph: Francis personally signed a Vatican statement of friendship at the end of the Muslim holy month of Ramadan.

headline.main: Pope Sends Message of Respect for Muslims
headline.print_headline: Pope Sends Message of Respect for Muslims
